title: Al Kharid mine

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Al Kharid mine (also called Scorpion mine) is a Mining area located just north of the desert city of Al Kharid.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Al Kharid mineThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Al-Kharid mine
Al Kharid mine
Released4 January 2001 (Update)
MembersNo
LocationNorth of Al Kharid (Kharidian Desert)
InhabitantsScorpions
Map
Advanced data
Typemine
Arabian 2
The music which plays when inside the mine

The Al Kharid mine (also called Scorpion mine) is a Mining area located just north of the desert city of Al Kharid.

The mine is advantageous because it is near a bank and a furnace and is located in a very low-risk location for its high-value infrequent rocks, such as gold, mithril, and adamantite. In addition, this mine is one of ten in RuneScape where three iron rocks can be mined without moving, thus ideal for power levelling, with the other nine being the Mining Guild, Legends' Guild mine, Piscatoris mine, Lovakengj mine, Verdant Valley on Fossil Island, Mount Karuulm mine, Trahaearn mine, Wilderness Resource Area, and Isle of Souls mine.

Contents

  • 1 Rocks
  • 2 Monsters
  • 3 Spawns
  • 4 NPCs
  • 5 Agility shortcut

Rocks[edit | edit source]

Rock MiningQuantity
LevelExp
Silver20405
Tin117.51
Copper117.53
Mithril55802
Adamantite70952
Gold40652
Coal30503
Iron15359

There are also two rocks that hold nothing.

Monsters[edit | edit source]

If here to power mine iron, the scorpions can be safespotted by angling one scorpion around the corner as shown here. This will also prevent any other scorpions from reaching you.

There are many level 14 scorpions in the Al Kharid mine. They are aggressive to players with a combat level of 28 or below, so low-levelled players should be careful.

Spawns[edit | edit source]

Two item spawns are located in the mine. The first one is four water runes and the second one is three fire runes.

NPCs[edit | edit source]

There is only one NPC located in the Al Kharid mine. He is called "Man" and cannot be attacked. During the Family Crest quest, his name is revealed to be Avan.

Agility shortcut[edit | edit source]

Members with 38 Agility can access (or exit) the Al Kharid mine via an Agility shortcut located on the northern part of the mine.

The '''Al Kharid mine''' (also called '''Scorpion mine''') is a [[Mining]] area located just north of the desert city of [[Al Kharid]].

The mine is advantageous because it is near a [[bank]] and a [[furnace]] and is located in a very low-risk location for its high-value infrequent rocks, such as [[Gold rock|gold]], [[Mithril rock|mithril]], and [[Adamantite rock|adamantite]]. In addition, this [[Mines|mine]] is one of ten in ''[[RuneScape]]'' where three iron rocks can be mined without moving, thus ideal for [[power levelling]], with the other nine being the [[Mining Guild]], [[Legends' Guild mine]], [[Piscatoris mine]], [[Lovakengj mine]], [[Verdant Valley]] on [[Fossil Island]], [[Mount Karuulm mine]], [[Trahaearn mine]], [[Wilderness Resource Area]], and [[Isle of Souls mine]].

==Rocks==
{{Rocktable
|Tin=1
|Copper=3
|Iron=9
|Silver=5
|Coal=3
|Gold=2
|Mithril=2
|Adamantite=2
}}
There are also two rocks that hold nothing.

==Monsters==
[[File:Al Kharid mine safespot.png|alt=This image depicts a method of safespotting the scorpions in the Al Kharid mine.|thumb|250px|If here to power mine iron, the scorpions can be safespotted by angling one scorpion around the corner as shown here. This will also prevent any other scorpions from reaching you.]]
There are many level 14 [[scorpion]]s in the [[Al Kharid]] mine. They are [[Aggressiveness|aggressive]] to players with a [[combat level]] of 28 or below, so low-levelled players should be careful.

==Spawns==
Two item [[Spawning|spawns]] are located in the mine. The first one is four [[water rune]]s and the second one is three [[fire rune]]s.

==NPCs==
There is only one [[Non-player character|NPC]] located in the [[Al Kharid]] mine. He is called "Man" and cannot be attacked. During the [[Family Crest]] [[Quests|quest]], his name is revealed to be [[Avan]].

==Agility shortcut==
[[Members]] with 38 [[Agility]] can access (or exit) the Al Kharid mine via an [[Agility]] [[Shortcuts|shortcut]] located on the northern part of the mine.
